text:
Lt. Gen. Abdel Fattah Abdelrahman Burhan (; born 11 July 1960) is a Sudanese politician and Sudanese Army lieutenant general. He was Chairman of the Sovereignty Council of Sudan, the country's collective transitional head of state.
He was the "de facto" head of state of Sudan as Chairman of the Transitional Military Council in 2019 after former Chairman Ahmed Awad Ibn Auf resigned and transferred control in April 2019.
In May 2019, Burhan's first international trip was to Egypt to meet Abdel Fattah el-Sisi. His second visit was to the United Arab Emirates.
